languages.text: "А я тебе говорил — надо на того ставить, на ком язв больше. Они почему-то самые живучие".

traits.locale_text: "А я тебе говорил — надо на того ставить, на ком язв больше. Они почему-то самые живучие".

languages.text: "I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."
languages.original_text: "А я тебе говорил — надо на того ставить, на ком язв больше. Они почему-то самые живучие".

traits.locale_text: "I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."
"I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."
"I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."
"I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."
"I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."

languages.text: «Te dije que apostaras por el que tiene más llagas. Por algún motivo, al final son los que más duran».
languages.original_text: "I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."

traits.locale_text: «Te dije que apostaras por el que tiene más llagas. Por algún motivo, al final son los que más duran».

languages.text: 「腫れの多いほうに賭けろと言ったはずだろ。なぜか一番最後まで残るんだ」
languages.original_text: "I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."

traits.locale_text: 「腫れの多いほうに賭けろと言ったはずだろ。なぜか一番最後まで残るんだ」

languages.text: “我早就告诉你，谁身上的脓疮最多，就押谁赢。不知道怎么回事，这些人总是撑到最后。”
languages.original_text: "I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."

traits.locale_text: “我早就告诉你，谁身上的脓疮最多，就押谁赢。不知道怎么回事，这些人总是撑到最后。”

languages.text: "Ich sagte doch, wettet auf die mit den meisten Geschwüren. Aus irgendeinem Grund halten sie am längsten durch."
languages.original_text: "I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sagte doch, wettet auf die mit den meisten Geschwüren. Aus irgendeinem Grund halten sie am längsten durch."

languages.text: « Je t'avais bien dit de parier sur le plus ravagé. Va savoir pourquoi, c'est toujours eux qui résistent le plus longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."

traits.locale_text: « Je t'avais bien dit de parier sur le plus ravagé. Va savoir pourquoi, c'est toujours eux qui résistent le plus longtemps. »

languages.text: "Dedim ya, en çok morluğu olana basacaktın parayı. Nedense en çok onlar dayanıyor."
languages.original_text: "I told you to bet on the one with the most sores. For some reason, they last the longest."
